title: William Orbit - Promotional/Rare Orbit/Pieces In A Modern Style
description:
Three very rare albums by William Orbit:

The Electric Chamber - Pieces In A Modern Style (Withdrawn CD) (1995) (320kbs)
VA - Promotional (Promo 2xCD) (2002) (VBR)
VA - Rare Orbit (Bootleg 4xCD) (2008) (192kbs)


-*-*-*-*-*-


"The Electric Chamber: Pieces In A Modern Style" is an album of synthesizer interpretations of Romantic & 20th-century classical music that was originally released in 1995 under the alias The Electric Chamber.

It was withdrawn from sale immediately due to objections from the publishers of Arvo PÃƒÂ¤rt and Henryk GÃƒÂ³recki, so very few copies made it into the hands of collectors.

In 2000, the album was re-released in expanded form with several new pieces, and with the PÃƒÂ¤rt and GÃƒÂ³recki compositions removed. "Pavane" was also replaced with a beatless version.


Discogs: <a href="
http://www.discogs.com/release/307829" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.discogs.com/release/307829</a>

1 - Adagio (Samuel Barber)
2 - Ogive (Erik Satie)

4 - Pavane (Maurice Ravel)
5 - Fratres (Arvo PÃƒÂ¤rt)
6 - Piece In The Old Style 1 (Henryk GÃƒÂ³recki)
7 - Piece In The Old Style 3 (Henryk GÃƒÂ³recki)



-*-*-*-*-*-



"Promotional" is a unique double promotional CD in a acrylic case containing many unique versions and some unreleased tracks. The set is a compilation of various artists and was sent out by Universal Film & TV to promote Orbit as a composer, and only around 1000 were made. 

Most tracks are edits/shorter versions and many unreleased before. Edits are indicated as "Promotional Edit".


Discogs: <a href="
http://www.discogs.com/release/597698" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.discogs.com/release/597698</a>

-*-*-*-*-*-



"Rare Orbit" is a web only bootleg compilation of William Orbit's own music, productions and remixes that was released as an MP3 192kbs torrent on ThePirateBay in 2008.

It features many unreleased tracks and unique versions, marked as "Rare Orbit Version". Many of the edits are from the "Promotional" CD and are marked thus. And artists and version names for each track have been triple checked and corrected for this torrent.

There is a known glitch in track 3-13 - this is how the file came and it has been marked in the filename. If you want a perfect copy of this track, download it elsewhere or buy the CD single.


Original torrent: <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4334107" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4334107</a>
